info.title: OpenJazz
info.author: Alister, tehpola
info.details:
OpenJazz-Wii is a port of OpenJazz by Alister (http://www.alister.eu/jazz/oj/).
	Special thanks to the developers of SDL-Wii for making this a breeze to port.
	Controls (hold the Wiimote sideways):
		Arrows: move
		2: shoot
		1: jump
		A: switch weapons
		Home: Esc
		+: Pause
	Network games don't work yet.
	Enjoy!
